Query 2:
 select * from ChessRow;

Statement prepared.

Library used incorrectly

Query 4:
 select * from ChessBoard,ChessRow where ChessRow.base=ChessBoard.row_id and color="white" and name="bishop";

Statement prepared.
row_id base name color 

1049104 1049104 bishop white 
1049104 1049104 bishop white 

Done
